content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 10 Mar 2019Are there any youtube channels to recommend that teaches me how to invest?1 answerAnswerBump0

Leonard TanLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 10 Mar 2019I believe anyone would tell you to be critical of their teachings- especially since some might have hidden agendas eg. monetise their "secret trading community". What worked for them in their investment style might not work for you- and their so called "track record" of supposed good buys does not mean you should idolise them.That being said- I think Warrior Investing youtube channel has pretty interesting content for interested day traders out there.0 comments0
